articles.description:
I hope everyone has had a great week of surveying!   We are finally back on track with the community and traffic is up over 1100% from this time last month.  We just accepted our 22,200th member to the community just a couple of days ago!  I just wanted to give you all a few important updates about new features and the fulfillment of several requests made by members inside the community.  Updates are always posted to our Twitter Page and Facebook Page so be sure to follow them.  
Also, if you appreciate the work I am doing and want to help the community pay the bills, please consider donating in any amount you can afford, here.

Updates for Those Looking for Surveying Jobs
For those looking for Surveying Jobs, Version Two of the Surveying Jobs App has been released for free use..updates ev…

articles.description:
Land surveys are an important part of heritage and history and without them who knows what the world would look like.  In fact, if it weren't for land surveys, we would not have maps. And although you should always consult a professional land surveyor regarding measurements on your property, let's look at how to read a land survey.
What is a Land Survey?
The term land survey can be considered to be very broad as it encompasses a wide range of different types of surveys. However, a land survey .....
articles.title: How to Read a Land Survey

articles.description: Land Surveyors United Community will turn 15 years old in 2022!  We've come a long way, together.  Keeping this community alive has been a labor of love to say the least.   My love for all of you, even those I haven't yet met, is what keeps me active and in constant pursuit of ways to make the community better, with no budget.  Every single day, the tools below help a surveyor find a job, source affordable equipment, solve a problem or simply improve in their surveying career.   This post is all...

articles.description: Land surveyors have a very important role in establishing ownership of land and helping ensure the smooth running of new building developments. In today’s guide we shall look at the accuracy of land surveys and why it’s so very important.Importance of Accuracy in Land SurveysAccuracy is one of the most important factors of land surveys. The purpose of a land survey is to accurately map and designate land boundaries. Any inaccuracies can lead to potential legal issues down the track.Some types of...
articles.title: On Accuracy in Land Surveying

articles.description: From construction layout of high-rise steel structures to 3-D laser scanning, Land surveyors perform comprehensive surveying services for commercial and residential developments, buildings, highways, bridges, utilities, waterways, and property acquisitions.
